title: RIOT, FOR THE LOVE OF EVERYTHING LEONA, GIVE US THIS SKIN!
body: So I know RiotScarizard already knows of this beautiful artwork (Done by the same person who did the recent Sona splash art!) and I've gotta say, I would DIE and go to HEAVEN if we had this skin for our lovely Tank lady, especially if it were a higher quality skin with added dialogue to it! If there's one thing I enjoy more in video games is the ability to see or have a character in a counterpart from what their normally shown as. Gentleman cho'gath is one of my favorites to this day for that reason. To see the Lady of the light be turned into this wonderful Gothic interpretation... RIOT, I'M THROWING MY WALLET AT THE COMPUTER SCREEN!

Saw this one going around on Twitter yesterday and was impressed. 

However, one of my personal favorite things about Leona is her more heavy armor feel. For me it somewhat defines her and while skins can always deviate from the norm it would be fantastic to see interpretations of this style into 'dark armor'.  It's not often you get to mix organic materials and metal plate together which makes for some very unique opportunities. There is definitely the core of a great idea here.

First, Holy! Two Reds in my thread! ^_^

With that out of the way, while I agree that perhaps the Dark Heavy Armor look would fit her perhaps a bit better, I'd both be afraid it wouldn't be too different from her Iron solari skin (Which already isn't the brightest of looks and fully embraces leona's fully armor look) And we've been shown in the past that that doesn't exactly have to be taken into account (Pool Party Leona).

Also, considering the artist who did this ALSO did your Sona artwork that's her current splash page, maybe you should talk to them about maybe doing something a bit closer to her Armor apparel?

The caveat I mentioned (that not all skins have to follow the formula created by a default champ look) sticks well â€” skin concepts can definitely break the mold and I love the ones that do!

My opinion was only added as a personal chiming in of 'hey this doesn't exactly feel like Leona'. This could easily be any of the other female champions in the game. I'm coming at this more from being a player myself and fan of Leona, not from a Riot perspective.

I definitely see where you're coming from in that this design could be adapted to basically any champion. New skin line maybe? I think adding armour would either ultimately drag out a new skin entirely, or your end up with a partly armoured partly cloth design that, sadly, would probably get accused of sexualising her armour by making the armour more sparse. 

Again, I totally get where you're coming from, but also think there's defnitely room to move past or overlook certain key aspects of a champion to get another take on them via a skin (Reaper Soraka for instance is sort of the exact antithesis of Soraka as a character but still works well)
Not if it looked similar to Death Stench armor.

*coughcoughpoolpartyleonacoughcoughcoughcough*

He's not saying that the heavy armor is *necessary* in a skin. He's saying that that's what he prefers, and he would personally enjoy seeing this same skin idea explored with heavy armor mixed in among those organic materials. Then, he notes that this idea has a great core, regardless of its final interpretation.

Personally, I love this art, and I also would be super interested in seeing a meat-and-metal dark skin for her. Here's hoping we get both soon! (no TM pls Ritorino)
